last_episode_to_air.name: Snow Storm
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tommy's attorneys prepare a new appeal. John Grisham speaks about what drew him to the stories surrounding the murders in Ada.

name: The Innocent Man
overview: In a story that gained national attention with John Grisham’s best-selling non-fiction book, The Innocent Man: Murder and Injustice in a Small Town, the six-part documentary series The Innocent Man focuses on two murders that shook the small town of Ada, Oklahoma, in the 1980s — and the controversial chain of events that followed.

episodes.name: Debbie and Denice
episodes.overview: A young woman is found brutally murdered in 1982 in Ada, Oklahoma. Two years later, another woman goes missing, sparking rumors of a connection.

episodes.name: In Dreams
episodes.overview: Tommy recounts his conversation with police about Denice's disappearance. Authorities pursue leads in Debbie's murder while her mom struggles to cope.

episodes.name: Rotten to the Core
episodes.overview: Citing new and previously withheld evidence, lawyers from the Innocence Project appeal the murder convictions of Ron and Dennis.

episodes.name: Corpus Delicti
episodes.overview: An autopsy reveals a stunning contradiction to Tommy and Karl's confession. Also, an investigative reporter canvases Ada for leads.

episodes.name: Smoking Guns
episodes.overview: While investigating the other possible suspects in Denice's murder, a reporter learns that getting people to talk can be tricky.

episodes.name: Snow Storm
episodes.overview: Tommy's attorneys prepare a new appeal. John Grisham speaks about what drew him to the stories surrounding the murders in Ada.
